name: Chicken Biryani
ingredients: Basmati rice, chicken pieces, onions, tomatoes, yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, biryani masala, saffron, milk, lemon juice, coriander leaves, mint leaves, green chilies, bay leaves, cloves, cardamom, cinnamon, ghee, and oil.
prep_instructions: Marinate the chicken in spices and yogurt. Fry the onions until golden brown. Cook the chicken in the onion mixture. Parboil the rice. Layer the rice and chicken with fried onions, mint, coriander, and saffron milk. Cook on a low flame.
serving_instructions: Serves 4-6 people. Serve with raita or mirchi ka salan.
